massim.eismassim

Class Statistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.eismassim.Statistic

  • public class Statistic
extends Object
    Class to be used for some statistic purpose, e.g. the time between requests and actions or the total number of actions of a distinct type
    Author:
    tobi
